trans-unit.target: Vidokezo vya utatuzi wa Uchapishaji wa Android

trans-unit.source: Problem: Android Device is not seeing book advertisements
trans-unit.target: Tatizo: Kifaa cha Android hakioni matangazo ya kitabu

trans-unit.source: When using this method, you need to run Bloom Reader, open its menu, and choose "Receive from Wi-Fi".
trans-unit.target: Unapotumia njia hii, unahitaji kutumia Bloom Reader, kufungua menyu yake, na uchague "Pokea kutoka kwa Wi-Fi".

trans-unit.source: Make sure the device is in the "Receive from Wi-Fi" screen
trans-unit.target: Hakikisha kifaa kiko kwenye skrini "Pokea kutoka kwa Wi-Fi"

trans-unit.source: Make sure the computer and device are on the same Wi-Fi network. A computer plugged in via cable to the Wi-Fi router still may be on its own network. It is technically possible to connect wired networks to be able to be on the same local subnet as Wi-Fi, but the Bloom team will not be able to provide any help in setting that up, sorry.
trans-unit.target: Hakikisha kompyuta na kifaa viko kwenye mtandao huo wa Wi-Fi. Kompyuta iliyochomekwa kupitia kebo kwa kisambaza Wi-Fi bado inaweza kuwa kwenye mtandao wake. Kitaalam inawezekana kuunganisha mitandao iliyotiwa waya ili kuweza kuwa kwenye mtandao mmoja wa ndani kama Wi-Fi, lakini timu ya Bloom haitaweza kutoa msaada wowote katika kuanzisha hiyo, samahani.

trans-unit.source: Make sure your computer doesn't have a firewall that is interfering. The windows Firewall will display when you first start advertising a book. If you said "No" to that, it might not ever ask you again. If you have additional 3rd party firewalls installed, try disabling them. Bloom advertises a book by broadcasting on the local net via UDP on port 5913, and Bloom Reader requests a book via port 5915.
trans-unit.target: Hakikisha kompyuta yako haina firewall ama kizuizi ambayo inaingilia kati. Firewall ya windows itaonyesha wakati unapoanza kutangaza kitabu. Ikiwa ulisema "Hapana" kwa hilo, huenda isingekuuliza tena. Ikiwa una vifaa vya ziada vya firewall za watu wengine, jaribu kuzizima. Bloom hutangaza kitabu kwa kutangaza kwenye wavu wa ndani kupitia UDP kwenye bandari ya 5913, na Bloom Reader huomba kitabu kupitia bandari ya 5915.

trans-unit.source: Problem: Bloom is not connecting to my device
trans-unit.target: Tatizo: Bloom haiunganishi kwenye kifaa changu

source.g: We have found this method to be problematic with many devices, so consider using the Wi-Fi method even if you are only working with a single device.

target.g: Tumegundua njia hii kuwa na shida na vifaa vingi, kwa hivyo fikiria kutumia njia ya Wi-Fi hata ikiwa unafanya kazi na kifaa kimoja tu.

trans-unit.source: When using this method, you do not have to go into any special mode to receive books. Just run Bloom Reader. Books should automatically appear when they are transferred.
trans-unit.target: Unapotumia njia hii, sio lazima uingie katika hali yoyote maalum ya kupokea vitabu. Endesha tu Bloom Reader. Vitabu vinapaswa kuonekana moja kwa moja wakati vinahamishwa.

trans-unit.source: Some Android devices have multiple modes they can be in when connected to a computer. Some will ask you as soon as you connect the cable to the computer. Bloom will be trying to talk to the device using a protocol called "MTP". If you're not sure that your device is connecting using MTP, try googling the name of your device + "MTP".
trans-unit.target: Vifaa vingine vya Android vina njia nyingi ambazo vinaweza kuwa wakati wa kuunganishwa na kompyuta. Wengine watakuuliza mara tu utakapounganisha kebo kwenye kompyuta. Bloom itajaribu kuzungumza na kifaa kwa kutumia itifaki inayoitwa "MTP". Ikiwa hauna hakika kuwa kifaa chako kinaunganisha kwa kutumia MTP, jaribu kutafuta jina la kifaa chako + "MTP".

trans-unit.source: The device should be showing up in Windows File Explorer (this feature is Windows-only)
trans-unit.target: Kifaa kinapaswa kuonekana kwenye Windows File Explorer (huduma hii ni Windows tu)

trans-unit.source: Try a different cable, or a different USB port.
trans-unit.target: Jaribu kebo tofauti, au kituo tofauti cha USB.
